name: Art Jam - SAE Perth Studio 3
description:
I'm in my 4th Trimester at SAE Perth now, doing a Game Design Course.

For the Art Jam we needed to take an artwork (of any kind) we liked and see if we could translate what we feel from that into a game. So I have tried to do that.

If you don't mind, please fill in this quick google form. 

Google Form Survey

Known Issues (may get fixed):

Trying to take objects into end rooms freezes them in place.

Objects can sometimes glitch outside the hallway.
